verses.name: Ezekiel 14:10
verses.text: And they shall bear the punishment of their iniquity: the punishment of the prophet shall be even as the punishment of him that seeketh unto him;

verses.name: Ezekiel 14:11
verses.text: That the house of Israel may go no more astray from me, neither be polluted any more with all their transgressions; but that they may be my people, and I may be their God, saith the Lord God.

verses.name: Ezekiel 14:12
verses.text: The word of the Lord came again to me, saying,
